documents.title: Publication: Letter from Nigel Huddleston MP to James Murray MP regarding government amendments relating to: research and development (R&D) relief intensity ratio fix, R&D relief transitional fix, creative relief fixes, and new clause 5: Electricity Generator Levy (EGL).
